file.name: jobEngine.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Job Engine
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths: {}

components:
  parameters:
    executionId:
      name: executionId
      in: path
      description: The ID of the Job Execution on which to perform the operation
      schema:
        $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId'
      required: true
  schemas:
    jobStartOptions:
      type: object
      properties:
        targetIdSublist:
          type: array
          items:
            allOf:
              - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId'
              - description: The ID of a Job Target
        resetStepIndex:
          type: boolean
        fromStepIndex:
          type: number
        enqueue:
          type: boolean
    isJobRunning:
      type: object
      properties:
        jobId:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId'
        isRunning:
          type: boolean
      example:
        isRunning: true
    multipleIsJobRunning:
      type: object
      properties:
        list:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/isJobRunning'
      example:
        list:
          - jobId: AQ
          - jobId: TqcLqDS4Wj4
            isRunning: false
          - jobId: dX63xIXNstA
            isRunning: false
    multipleJobIdRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        jobIds:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId'
      example:
        jobIds:
          - dX63xIXNstA
          - TqcLqDS4Wj4
          - AQ

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: at 1:15: schemas: "multipleIsJobRunning": parse schema: property "list": at 1:886: parse schema: item: at 1:895: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/isJobRunning": parse schema: property "jobId": at 1:347: parse schema: resolve "../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId": external "../openapi.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
